name: GUPT: The Lost Maze Game
description:
Gupt is a maze escape game, with a twist of puzzle solving. It's a mini game made by a solo developer in Unreal Engine4 . Controller Support is still under-development
,so using controller might cause problem.

CONTROLS:-
Movement:- WASD or Gamepad Left Thumbstick
Camera:- Mouse or Gamepad Right Thumbstick
Interaction:- E/ENTER or Gamepad Left Shoulder
Jump:- SpaceBar or MotionController (R) FaceButton 1
Pause:- Esc/P/Pause or MotionController (R) FaceButton 3
